personal_statement_what_to_improve: Personal statement talks about wanting to teach Science, with no mention of Maths at all. As applicants degree is not in Maths, we  would expect to see more evidence of an interest in and  desire to Teach Maths.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: Demonstrate a clearer interest in Maths and why you want to teach this subject.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: Given that our Maths course at this Hub is almost full and will be soon be closing, we have other applicants still in process who have stronger Maths qualifications and a clear desire to teach Maths.
